document_data.name: Helenia
document_data.mainbody: '''Helenia''' was a Cashguard in the employ of the [[Counting House]] of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Helenia was a [[human]] woman with a light brown skin tone and chestnut eyes. As a Cashguard, she wore a set of uniform [[breastplate]] [[armor]] and a [[helmet]]. Yonni was armed with a two-handed [[heavy crossbow]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Cashguard Helenia was tasked with guarding and patrolling the private docks that belonged to the Counting House in the [[Baldur's Gate/Lower City|Lower City]], alongside a number of fellow Cashguards and the city's [[steel watcher]]s.
